Text: Capacity for May thoff to Paris tomorrow until the th Please feel free to call Greg Maliken in my absence and check the website for daily postings I cant promise that this email will be daily I have dth available for ISS on the east side of my system and available at Colden which requires Tenn Zone capacity Im not sure what the weekend is looking like but Greg should be able to tell you tomorrow morning Transportation paths are open and I can move dth on my Niagara to Leidy line today tomorrow into the foreseeable future Advance is available youre guess is as good as mine with the daily pricing lately Merrill Lynch is forecasting electric demand price spikes this summer while Salomon Smith Barney sees near time pricing subsiding Au revoir Abigail gsweb

Capacity for June thGood Morning All I think its going to be a great Wednesday It may hit here in Buffalo The City will have to get warm soon and when it does storage injections will slow and Ill have some ISS available I dont have any today IT is available I am working with some of you on deals already the others may want to start watching the Niagara Leidy spread Abigail gsweb

Capacity for June thISS is unavailable today The warmer weather is resulting in our LDC injecting at their maximum level IT is available and the numbers from this morning show spread between Niagara and points close to Leidy Im using Dominion Appl Lets see what happens during the morning I have capacity up to IAS has a meager spread over the winter Is everyone else as bearish on prices as Salomon Smith Barney Abigail gsweb

Capacity for the thIT through Concord is available for dth between Niagara and Leidy dth between Pendleton and Leidy We are posting dth excess injection on either the East or West Side but we have already seen interest from shippers with primary rights to use that space Therefore Id advise against IAS returns and excess injections Excess withdrawals are fine system wide and IAS advances are available for dth I also want to remind you that our Firm Transport Open Season between Ellisburg and Leidy expires Wednesday October st Please call your firm sales representative for more detail or visit our website Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm What a great game between Flutie and Johnson and I heard Dallas won Any given Sunday
OpppsIm sorry I made a mistake No excess injections all the excess withdrawals you want Its Friday please understand Abigail

Capacity for the WeekendBig football weekend in Western New York People have bounties out for Fluties head The local radio station is having a bon fire to throw Flutie Voo Doo Dolls into tonight Excess injections and IAS is available for the weekend No excess withdrawals All of you firm shippers are resisting withdrawing gas All of you who owe us gas can blame them NOT me Although I space through Concord Niagara is full for IT for the weekend Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm

Capacity for the thGood Morning do we care about the AGA number today or is it clear enough that we are full Lots of space available through Concord today from IT dth No excess injections system wide Excess withdrawals and IAS gas up to dth Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm

Capacity for the rdNO excess injections on either side of the system IT through Concord is available for dth Excess withdrawals and IAS gas is available system wide Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm QUOTE OF THE DAY Were selling more Cipro in a day than we used to in a month Its more popular than Viagra ALEX ORERGEL a pharmacist in Tijuana Mexico

Capacity for the thBetter late than never IT though Concord is available for dth No excess injections on the system Excess withdrawals no problem or IAS up to dth Abigail QUOTE OF THE DAY More people have been struck by lightning in the last days Ill bet than have contracted anthrax The country badly needs to settle down SENATOR JOHN McCAIN

Capacity for the thIs today going to be a busy day I cant believe a FORECAST of possible future cold weather can move the market like it did yesterday Is that because Im so green in this business Or is something else going on AGA Over or under Bcf IT through Concord is available for dth Due to some cold weather I have room for excess injections on the East Side dth West Side dth Excess withdrawals or IAS system wide up to dth Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm

Capacity for the thShort week Our open season for firm transportation from Pendleton to Elliisburg ends today Please call you firm services rep if you are interested or have any last minute questions I have dth of excess onsystem deliveries Onsystem deliveries include injections into storage and deliveries to the City Gate We believe that injections are going to prove tight since our distribution marketers and LDC will probably serve their load with on system deliveries not from removing gas from storage Therefore I am not recommending you make excess injections into storage unless you have a secondary place to move the gas to if we get into a curtailment period tomorrow I have through Concord The back haul spread looked very favorable this morning Call me if you are interested in using the path on the intra day or for tomorrows gas day Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm Im disappointed the Bills game wasnt on TV yesterday It was degrees and sunny We lost by three but Van Pelt showed up and played a good game My point spread may have been slightly pre mature maybe next week

Capacity for the stBuenos Dias Im practicing my Spanish because Im going to Ecuador for New Years Eve On an intra day basis I have dth excess injection on the East Side for the th Since it is getting a little cooler here I also have dth available on the East Side for excess injection tomorrow nothing on the West IT through Concord is available dth at Niagara the rest can flow through Pendleton No IAS payback or ISS space I will be off tomorrow Please call Greg Maliken if you have any questions about the long weekend I can tell you now that Thursday and Friday are predicted to be warmer and our system load will be depressed due to the holiday Therefore excess on system deliveries are not going to be large Please use the website There will be daily postings available Happy Turkey Eating Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm

Capacity for the thI trust everyone had a nice Thanksgiving US customers The weather sure did cooperate with a long weekend if you werent too long on gas We have NO excess injections available for the East or West side I have dth available through Concord today The backhaul from Leidy to Niagara looked attractive to me this morning NO IAS OR ISS injections Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm QUOTE OF THE DAY The customer has the means What we are watching now is do they have the will CARL STEIDTMAN of Deloitte Research on holiday shopping I dont know about you but I definitely have the will And so do the hundreds of people who RAN into Target on Friday

Capacity for May stI am unable to offer any ISS for an intra day nomination today or for tomorrows gas day Operations is anticipating warm weather in Buffalo a balmy degrees so our LDC will be injecting at their maximum amount as will the other firm shippers If you have small amounts under dth call me and I can let you know if we could squeeze it in somewhere As you all know I tell you daily IT is available Lets get strategic and use it Volumes over dth can be moved North to South or vice versa Now for a little Thursday inspirationa quote It is better to be looked over than overlooked Mae West I think that is applicable to men and women Abigail gsweb

Capacity for the thI have excess on system deliverys on the East Side for dth that includes injections and deliveries to city gate Capacity through Concord is available for forward haul from Niagara No intraday back haul space from Niagara to Leidy is available I do have dth available for back haul on the th No ISS or IAS payback Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm QUOTE OF THE DAY He just doesnt feel to me like the surrendering type DONALD H RUMSFELD secretary of defense on Mullah Muhammad Omar

Capacity for June thru rdHappy Friday Can any of you believe this McVeigh debacle The only ISS available today and through the weekend is down hole transfer capacity at Ellisburg IT is available for the foreseeable future that being the next few days Unfortunately we are not seeing the geographic arbitrage opportunity on the Niagara to Leidy path If some of you have attractive commodity prices along that path I am willing to discount the tariff IT rate to help you move it on our system Have a great weekend Abigail gsweb

Capacity for May thIm backand have some opportunities to go with todays attractive prices IT I can move gas all over the system although the Niagara to Leidy doesnt look very attractive for this morning ISS According to early reports from Dispatch Niagara and East Aurora have dth available for injection today through Thursday while Rose Lake has available today and tomorrow Lamont has available today and tomorrow Please call me to confirm any noms The amount of excess availability is subject to change as the day goes on and the prices fall Down hole transfers at Ellisburg are thru Thursday IAS isnt quite there yet The summer thru winter spread looks uneconomic Im looking forward to making some deals today Abigail PARIS IS A MUST gsweb

Capacity for June th Gas DayISS is unavailable for the th I will know if there is any intra day availability after pm today If there is any Ill send a notification IT is available The spread between Niagara and Leidy points is becoming more pronounced I can move up to dth There may be some opportunity on that path this week Abigail gsweb

Capacity for June IT is available and may be attractive in the coming months between Niagara and Leidy I can and would like to discuss month long IT contracts along that path It may get hot sometime this summer you never know and gas would be valuable at Leidy I have dth East side storage available on an ISS transaction I can even supply the gas on an IAS basis for the additional injection if you have the credit Abigail gsweb

Capacity as of May thHappy Over the Hump Day Unfortunately ISS is unavailable today The attractive pricing we are seeing is generating maximum firm injections IT is available and I can move dth between Niagara and Leidy A number of other paths are open and I am ready to work with any of you on a particular path of interest to your market Abigail gsweb

Capacity for June thHAPPY Friday Go Devils No Interruptible storage on our system for the weekend The rising temperatures are eating into our excess injectibility Interruptible transportation is available I realize that the spread between Niagara and Leidy is tight in June but July basis has been attractive I am able to set up contracts for next month now Have a great weekend Abigail gsweb

Capacity for the thI guess we all do care about the AGA number If the number is low due to the increasing difficulty companies are having injecting gas I believe it Our system is very full right now Therefore no excess injections for tomorrow IT through Concord for dth Excess withdrawals and IAS gas is available for dth Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm

Capacity for the thNo onsystem capacity available that includes excess injections or deliveries to Distribution City Gate IT through Concord is available for tomorrows gas day for up to dth Have any of you gotten a better handle on the pricing we saw late yesterday Gas Daily quoted traders who thought there was some unexplained buying go on Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm

Capacity for the thHello All what an exciting game last night No excess injections for the rest of the week That means no IAS payback either IT between Niagara and Leidy is available for dth IAS or excess withdrawals dth system wide Have a great Tuesday Abigail

Capacity for May thoff to Paris tomorrow until the th Please feel free to call Greg Maliken in my absence and check the website for daily postings I cant promise that this email will be daily I have dth available for ISS on the east side of my system and available at Colden which requires Tenn Zone capacity Im not sure what the weekend is looking like but Greg should be able to tell you tomorrow morning Transportation paths are open and I can move dth on my Niagara to Leidy line today tomorrow into the foreseeable future Advance is available youre guess is as good as mine with the daily pricing lately Merrill Lynch is forecasting electric demand price spikes this summer while Salomon Smith Barney sees near time pricing subsiding Au revoir Abigail gsweb

RE Capacity for the stHAH You know I cant tell you But your close Thats all Im saying And Im a small Id like a fancy Enron shirt A AM You look really nice today I like that outfit you are wearing How full is storage When are we going to lunch What size shirt do you wear Original Message From Abigail Maines ATFUELCOMENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAbigailMainesCMainesANATFUELECOME NRONcom Sent Monday August AM To Germany Chris Subject RE Capacity for the st Where have you been Maybe listening to a presentation from Lay about the future of Enron Storage looks pretty full We didnt have a net withdrawal last week A AM New website Where have I been Hows that storage looking Original Message From Abigail Maines ATFUELCOMENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAbigailMainesCMainesANATFUELECOME NRONcom Sent Monday August AM To Germany Chris Espey Darren Tate Paul Subject Capacity for the st Happy Monday all did you miss me Friday I havent heard much feedback about our new website Please let me know if any of you have any suggestions or questions about it We have dth available for ISS South of Concord North of Concord and on the West Side This space is available for IAS payback as well There is not much spread between Niagara and Leidy so I have dth available through Concord I like to think that means our system is extremely efficient Must be the good information I send out that improves the efficiency right I also have dth available for excess withdrawal of IAS opportunity Or for your use if Chantal spins out of control and hits your suppliers Abigail gswebmarketDailyCapDeskDlyCpDeskhtm This email
